about_the_game:
Hi and welcome. We are Mr. Trees.
Welcome to Finn's life! We've been waiting in this forest for decades, but finally we found someone to tell. Now you're here, you can listen to Finn's story!

Finn, a high school student, lives in a town with his mother and friends.(She makes very nice pies.)
We remember him even as a child. He was a sweetheart! Unfortunately, he didn't see much of his father as a child. But, he has a lot of friends which are adorable. He hangs with them all day. We think their names were Guffie, Fluffy, Axy, Froggie, Foggie, Salsie. If we had to explain them:

Guffie: The purple ghost.
Fluffy: Cutest cat alive.
Axy: The pink axolotl.
Froggie: Frog laughing meme.
Salsie: The shy tomato.
Foggie: Tired from climate change.

Furthermore, we are super excited to see you. Don't miss this adventure! We'll be waiting for you!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains sensitive subject of suicide and depression. If you are under the age of 18 and find yourself sensitive to these issues, please do not play. Viewer discretion is advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel N4100 or better
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 264 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 display is recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 264 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 display is recommended

short_description: Join Finn on his adventure through the most beautiful periods of his adolescence! Finn, a 16 year old boy, lives in a cute town with his mother and friends. So, what will happen in his life? Put on your coats to find out, because Norway is cold! This game is not suitable for all audiences.
